mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CAR_DETAIL cd WHERE car_code in ( SELECT CAR_CODE FROM CAR_MANAGE cm WHERE not ( BOOKING_START >= TO_DATE(#{booking_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-1/24 AND BOOKING_DONE <= TO_DATE(#{booking_done}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1/24 ) )
mapper.update: UPDATE CAR_DETAIL SET PRO_STATUS = 1 WHERE CAR_CODE = #{car_code}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM CAR_MANAGE WHERE CAR_CODE =#{car_code} AND BOOKING_AGREE = 0 ORDER BY CAR_CODE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
